translations: [生物]品种；族类（breed 的复数形式）
繁殖；导致（breed 的三单形式）；引起；养育

sentences.sentence: The equation is simple: research breeds new products.
sentences.translation: 这个情况是简单的：研究孕育新产品。

sentences.sentence: These cattle are one of the purest breeds in Britain.
sentences.translation: 这些牛是英国最纯的品种之一。

sentences.sentence: All of these are useful breeds whose potentiality has not been realized.
sentences.translation: 所有这些都是有益的品种，其潜力尚未被认识到。
